577590.name: Fantasy Grounds - Drow (Token Pack)
577590.description:
Drow Token Pack


This token pack contains 21 tokens you can use to represent various Drow characters or NPCs.

This token pack includes:

  • Drow Female Alchemist
  • Drow Female Anti-Paladin
  • Drow Female Death Priestess
  • Drow Female Denrelwe
  • Drow Female Duelist
  • Drow Female High Priestess
  • Drow Female Leaping Mage
  • Drow Female mage
  • Drow Female Necromancer
  • Drow Female Warpriest
  • Drow Female War Priestess
  • Drow Female Warrior
  • Drow Leaping Mage
  • Drow Male Assassin
  • Drow Male Brooding Sorcerer
  • Drow Male Druid
  • Drow Male Monk
  • Drow Male Ranger
  • 2 Drow Male Sorcerer
  • Drow Male Warrior

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Released on January 21, 2016. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.1.6 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.
